post.text: "I know it sometimes seems a little odd for someone running for president to say we need more love and kindness in America. But I'm telling you from the bottom of my heart, we do."

comment.author: Rachel
comment.text: I'm so very proud of HRC. What a great candidate and great women.

replies.author: Tianna
replies.text: Remember to call all your representatives and demand an indictment of Hillary Clinton. Call 1-202-224-3121 and Hold Hillary accountable. Demand Action Enough is enough! Hillary must resign her campaign immediately. Pressure works. Keep applying it. Call 3 or 4 times! Let's get this job done quickly folks! Please pass this around Rachel.. thanks for your support!
